solution_line_template: First find the total number of times the wombats claw him: {num_wombats} wombats * {claws_per_wombat} claws/wombat = <<{num_wombats}*{claws_per_wombat}={total_wombat_claws}>>{total_wombat_claws} claws
Then add the number of times the rheas claw him to find the total: {total_wombat_claws} claws + {total_rhea_claws} claws = <<{total_wombat_claws}+{total_rhea_claws}={total_claws}>>{total_claws} claws
